full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**

### Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites eligible suppliers to participate in a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) for the provision of coffee and tea services.

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4220654570-Doc4231848810
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4220654570
* **Publication Date:** March 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 8, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** March 14, 2024
* **Contract Start Date:** October 1, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** May 14, 2025
* **Tender Status:** Expired

### Project Overview

The PSPC seeks to establish a standing offer for the provision of coffee and tea services, as indicated by the UNSPSC code 50201700 (Coffee and tea).

### Contract Location

The contract will be delivered in the provinces of Nova Scotia, New Brunswick, Canada, and Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

 MacFarlane, Andrew (SPAC/PSPC)
 andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Document Information

The tender notice and related documents can be found on the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17567261?extsite=MTc1NjcyNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17567261?extsite=MTc1NjcyNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

Note: Please ensure that your company is registered with the relevant authorities and has the necessary certifications and experience to participate in this tender. You can find more information on the official government website.  #governmenttender #procurement #bidopportunity
